definition: overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia

sentences.english: Bones hung from the ceiling like a macabre chandelier.
sentences.chinese: 吊在天花板上的骨頭就像是一個陰森的枝形吊燈。

sentences.english: Its pale rays fled out on either hand; beautiful but grim was the vision they disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 微弱的光線向兩旁流瀉而出，照出的景象美麗而陰森。

sentences.english: This eerie festivity is observed in America and Europe on October 31.
sentences.chinese: 美國和歐洲都視10月31日爲陰森的節慶。

sentences.english: A customer walks past the eerie Jackson fairy tale painting.
sentences.chinese: 一名顧客經過陰森恐怖的傑克遜童話畫作。

sentences.english: The windows of the house stared bleakly down at her.
sentences.chinese: 那座房子的窗戶居高臨下陰森森地對着她。

sentences.english: His answer, for the first time to me, made terrible sense.
sentences.chinese: 他的回答，第一次讓我產生了陰森可怖的感覺。

sentences.english: Software Description: About Haunted House, This is a dark and spooky haunted house.
sentences.chinese: 這是黑和陰森森受到折磨的房子。

sentences.english: The presence of this gibbet sufficed to render gloomy all the surrounding places.
sentences.chinese: 那刑臺的存在足以使那一帶顯得陰森恐怖。

sentences.english: Walking through a graveyard at night is the spookiest thing I can think of.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚穿過墓地是我所能想到的最陰森可怕的事情。

sentences.english: Do you hear it's sepulchral tone ?
sentences.chinese: 你是否聽到那陰森森的音調？

sentences.english: Village of whole Gu Huai is enveloping breath of a ghastly bloodcurdling.
sentences.chinese: 整個古槐村籠罩着一股陰森恐怖的氣息。

sentences.english: He paints an otherworldly, murky scene of dread in the cemetery where lightening flashes and thunder roars.
sentences.chinese: 他把墓地描寫得陰森恐怖，不時伴有電閃雷鳴。

sentences.english: Starbuck sees it as a gloomy religious warning.
sentences.chinese: 斯達巴克把它看作是冥冥上蒼的一個陰森森的警告。

sentences.english: Darting, one never knows where, their tenebrous orbs.
sentences.chinese: 陰森森的眼珠不知道盯着什麼地方。

sentences.english: Like a gryphon puffing flames, crashed through Night's staggered saber-like tusks.
sentences.chinese: 像噴火的怪獸轟鳴着穿過夜陰森交錯的白牙。

definition: to pervade/to fill the air/diffuse/everywhere present/about to inundate (water)/permeated by (smoke)/filled with (dust)/to saturate (the air with fog, smoke etc)
to be shocked/to be appalled/to be terrified
evil influence/unhealthy trend/(a person's) evil air/aura of wickedness/(TCM) pathogenic energy (opposite: 正氣|正气[zheng4 qi4], vital energy)
overwhelmed with shock, horror or amazement/dumbstruck/aghast
lit. shocks the eye, astonishes the heart (idiom); shocking/horrible to see/a ghastly sight
